member.name: M:Rhetos.TestCommon.TestUtility.AssertAreEqualByLine(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Useful for comparing long texts. Reports first line that doesn't match.

member.name: M:Rhetos.TestCommon.TestUtility.CheckDatabaseAvailability(System.String)
member.summary: Unit test will be marked as "Inconclusive" if this function fails.

member.name: M:Rhetos.TestCommon.TestUtility.CompressReport(System.String)
member.summary: Shortens sequences of repeating characters, if longer then 3. Example: "aaaaaaaaaaXXXbbbb" => "aaa...(10)XXXbbb...(5)"
